title: Morningstar
description: In a future where the human race struggles to survive, the only elite are the hunters laying their lives on the line every night to defend their own kind against the undead predators. But one man stands above them all. Morningstar. Can the most feared vampire hunter find solace and passion in the arms of his sworn enemy, one of the undead? In an environment of oppressive laws, designed to help the human race survive a massive population collapse, the attraction between Daniel and Scott is blazing and instantaneous... and outlawed. But how will they overcome the obstacles they face, when one is sworn to kill the other?
author: Jade Falconer
